term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - measurement procedure with standard addition
term.title: measurement procedure with standard addition

item.text: Measurement procedure in which indications are obtained for an analytical sample as well as for analytical samples with addition(s) of a measurement standard.

notes.item: A measurement procedure with standard addition provides an unbiased measurement result if there is a multiplicative matrix effect.

sources.item: PAC, 2021, 93, 997. 'Metrological and quality concepts in analytical chemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 2021)' on page 1012 (https://doi.org/10.1515/pac-2019-0819)
